SKT_FIRST.name: I Sleepwalk
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>的几率使目标<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Still Drowsy
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to decrease <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> of all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>と<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>와 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的概率使全体敌人的<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>和<color=#28d9ed>暴击率</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Sweet Dreams
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Silenced</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>沈黙</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>침묵</color> 상태로 만듭니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率使敌人陷入<color=#28d9ed>沉默</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Removes 1 additional buff from the target
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 対象の強化効果1個追加解除
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 额外解除1个目标强化效果

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Reduces Sweet Dreams Cooldown by 1 turn
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 【おやすみなさあい】\nスキルターン-1ターン
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 晚安好梦冷却时间-1回合

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Removes 1 additional buff from the target
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 対象の強化効果1個追加解除
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 额外解除1个目标强化效果

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to reduce Attack of the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> of the target by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象の攻撃力を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상의 공격력을 감소시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>-30%</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使目标的攻击力降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>降低<color=#28d9ed>-30%</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
